Package com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders

Class LuxuryBinder

java.lang.Object
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders.Binder
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders.SellableBinder
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders.LuxuryBinder
public class LuxuryBinder extends SellableBinder
The LuxuryBinder class represents a special type of SellableBinder that only accepts cards with variants other than NORMAL. It allows setting a custom value for the binder, which must be at least as high as its base value. The final binder value is calculated with a 10% premium.

This class enhances SellableBinder by supporting custom valuation and stricter card acceptance rules.

Cards are sorted alphabetically upon successful addition.

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public boolean addCard(Card card)
      Attempts to add a card to the binder. Only cards with non-NORMAL variants are allowed. If successfully added, the binder's custom value is updated if necessary.
      Overrides:
      addCard in class SellableBinder
      Parameters:
      card - the Card to add
      Returns:
      true if the card is added; false otherwise

      A UI message is shown to indicate success or failure.

    • setCustomValue

      public boolean setCustomValue(double customValue)
      Sets a custom value for the binder, provided it's at least as large as the default binder value.
      Parameters:
      customValue - the new custom value to set
      Returns:
      true if the value was updated; false if it's below the base value

    • getBinderValue

      public double getBinderValue()
      Gets the total binder value with a 10% premium based on the custom value.
      Overrides:
      getBinderValue in class SellableBinder
      Returns:
      the calculated binder value with the premium
